answers.answer: I had it done, came out negative the second time.
Supposedly it happens a lot. My dr just goes straight to the 3hr one as he thinks the 1hr one in unreliable.
Yea I failed the one hour one but passed the 3 hour one .  Its very common
I had the 1 hour one where you drink that disgusting water.  It came out borderline high but not diabetic
I only took the 1hr came back good so i didn't have to take the 3hr
Yes high first time did 3 hour I was fine

question: Has anyone ever had to take a sugar glucose test to test for diabetes and have their first test come back as your blood sugar a little high? And then have to take a 3 hour blood test to confirm if yuh have diabetes or anything? Did it come back positive the second time?
title: Glucose test :o
